inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getStream.

tags.description: Map of tags to assigned to the stream.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getStream.

arn.description: ARN of the Kinesis Stream (same as id).

closedShards.description: List of shard ids in the CLOSED state. See [Shard State](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/kinesis-using-sdk-java-after-resharding.html#kinesis-using-sdk-java-resharding-data-routing) for more.

creationTimestamp.description: Approximate UNIX timestamp that the stream was created.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

openShards.description: List of shard ids in the OPEN state. See [Shard State](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/kinesis-using-sdk-java-after-resharding.html#kinesis-using-sdk-java-resharding-data-routing) for more.

retentionPeriod.description: Length of time (in hours) data records are accessible after they are added to the stream.

shardLevelMetrics.description: List of shard-level CloudWatch metrics which are enabled for the stream. See [Monitoring with CloudWatch](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/monitoring-with-cloudwatch.html) for more.

status.description: Current status of the stream. The stream status is one of CREATING, DELETING, ACTIVE, or UPDATING.

streamModeDetails.description: [Capacity mode](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/how-do-i-size-a-stream.html) of the data stream. Detailed below.

tags.description: Map of tags to assigned to the stream.
